pkgmetadata.longdescription: Seamless Access to IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data // Provides tools to download, process, and analyze data from the International Monetary Fund's World Economic Outlook (WEO) database https://www.imf.org/en/Publications/SPROLLs/world- economic-outlook-databases. Functions support downloading complete WEO releases, accessing specific economic indicators for selected countries, and listing available data.
